meanings.definition: relating to or involving the classification of living organisms based on their relationships and evolutionary history

meanings.sent3: The biosystematic study of animals in the forest revealed some surprising family ties.

meanings.sent5: Learning about biosystematic classification can be like solving a fascinating mystery.
